entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Implement enumerating native code methods to complete tiered JIT diagnostics story #9782
    Future

Updated

  • System numerics abort at System.Numerics.BigIntegerCalculator.Multiply #94610
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_DeleteCategory #94395
  • [8.0] Failure in Wasi.Build.Tests.WasiTemplateTests.ConsoleBuildAndRunForDifferentOutputPaths #94537
    8.0.x
  • An error occurred trying to start process 'llvm-symbolizer' #91975
    9.0.0
  • Test timeout in System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl.Tests on mono Amd64 OSX #94436
  • [wasm] perf: AOT `CompileError: WebAssembly.Module(): Compiling function #116384:"System_Linq_Expressions_System_Linq_Expressions..." failed: not enough arguments on the stack for call (need 4, got 2) ` #94431
    9.0.0
  • Failing test `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.CancelStopAsync` #94268
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.SimpleRunTests.BlazorBuildRunTest` failing on Windows #94240
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Globalization.Calendars.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` and `System.Globalization.Hybrid.WASM.Tests` getting terminated #94225
  • [browser][hybridGlobalization] WBT: Hybrid Globalization fails with AOT #94212
  • [wasm] Runtime tests' build gets terminated with `exited with code 137` #94077
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in DecryptEnvelopedOctetStringWithExtraData (linux x64) #94067
    Future
  • `System.Linq.Queryable.Tests` native crash for `mono_interpreter` `Debian.11.Amd64` #93990
    9.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT completely broken on 8.0 branch #93900
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Tests timing out #93840
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT iOS/osx/tvos legs are timing out on many PRs #93784
  • French abbreviated month names not showing up as expected #90639
    9.0.0
  • Failing test - `HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async_HttpMessageInvoker.RequestDuration_ConnectionClosedWhileReceivingHeaders_Recorded` #93627
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [wasm] Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.MaxMagnitude(tensorLength: 53) #93620
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #58628
    9.0.0

    9.0.0

    9.0.0
  • [wasm] JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #93347
    9.0.0
  • JIT\Stress\ABI\pinvokes_d tests timed out #93297
    9.0.0

    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] System.Runtime.Caching assert fails on linux-bionic #93106

    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty failed #88843
    Future
  • The system cannot open the device or file specified 'NuGet-Migrations' #91987

  • [wasm] WBT: Blazor tests on windows failing with `Failed to bind to address` for random ports #92910

  • [8.0] 'RanToCompletion' failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #92804

  • `System.Net.NameResolution.Functional.Tests` - crashed with `Process terminated. Assertion failed.` #92793

  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh Timed Out on Mono OSX x64 with interpreter #92733

    9.0.0

    8.0.0
  • [mono] Android x64: No pending exception expected: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException #92000
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Long Running Test: System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.TaskPropertiesTests.TaskIDTest #91907
    9.0.0
  • Linux Mono DsaNotDirectlySupported Rfc3279DerSequence failed to sign #91898
    9.0.0
  • Address race in PerformanceCounterLib #90803
    9.0.0
  • [debugger] `SteppingTests` fail on CI with `Command timed out, and was killed` #91801

  • [wasm][debugger] Timeout waiting for CheckInspectLocalsAtBreakpointSite #91773
    9.0.0
  • CI error: System.Net.Quic.QuicException: The connection timed out from inactivity #91757
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !"UnwindManagedExceptionPass1: PAL_VirtualUnwind failed" #91723
    9.0.0
  • MacCatalyst/tvOS networking test failures #91705
  • Failure in System.Threading.RateLimiting.Test.ConcurrencyLimiterTests.DoesNotDeadlockCleaningUpCanceledRequestedLease_Post #91653
    9.0.0
  • AF: m_alignpad == 0 (LibraryImportGenerator.Unit.Tests) #91569
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] [Long Running Test] System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.CESchedulerPairTests.TestCompletionTask #91434
    9.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBinderTests.GetCanReadStaticProperty test failing #91308
    9.0.0
  • STATUS_UNSUCCESSFUL in RsaCryptRoundtrip_OaepSHA1 #29683
    Future
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
    Future
  • tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource failing in CI #90605
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] Tests failing `nativeaot/SmokeTests/StackTraceMetadata/StackTraceMetadata/StackTraceMetadata.sh` on tvos-arm64 #90460
    9.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Numerics.Tests.WorkItemExecution failure terminate the process because of out of memory #90439
    Future
  • Build Failure on MacOS ARM64 Rid issue with sqlite #90434
    9.0.0
  • NonBacktracking engine is pathologically slow on patterns like "((((((((a)*)*)*)*)*)*)*" and input like "aaaaaaa" which other engines handle fine #84188
    9.0.0
  • InvalidOperationException due to use of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.BinaryOperatorKind.Error enum #90331
    9.0.0
  • Tracking issue for "WORKLOAD TIMED OUT" #90309
  • [browser] Fragile WebSocket CI tests #90257
    9.0.0
  • Error: The type initializer for 'Microsoft.DotNet.XHarness.TestRunners.Common.ApplicationOptions' threw an exception. #90040
  • Crash in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0.Tests.WorkItemExecution #90019
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] AOT: `System.Text.Json.Tests` crashing inexplicably #89984
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebuggerTests.MiscTests.TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` failing #89909

    9.0.0
  • [Test Failure] Long Running Test: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_Sync.SendRecv_Stream_TCP_LargeMultiBufferSends #89440
    Future
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 #89425
    9.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm][debugger] Debugger tests getting randomly aborted on CI #89409
    9.0.0
  • [6.0] [mono] [linux] Conole test failure SetOut.SetOutReadToEnd #89084
    6.0.x
  • [osx][x64] LibraryImportGenerator unit test segfault illegal memory access #89054
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationClientServer.CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok on Windows AoT #88832
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] [wasm] Chrome DateTimeTests CheckDateTimeLocale failure #88799
    Future
  • [7.0] Linux_bionic arm64 failure in Convert.cs causing FormatException in System.Diagnostics.Process tests #88756
    7.0.x
  • CI test failures in GenerateRuntimeGraphTests on tvOS simulator and iOS simulator. #77889
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization IcuAppLocalTests .TestIcuAppLocal test failure #88742
    7.0.x
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest #85331

    Future
  • [wasm] perf pipeline clang crashes on PERFTIGER200 #88148

  • Native crash on System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn4.4.Tests net8.0-linux-Debug-arm64-Mono_release #88102
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] The WebSocket is not connected. #88084
    9.0.0
  • `JIT/jit64/opt/rngchk/RngchkStress2.cs` failing to build with `error CS8078: An expression is too long or complex to compile` #87879

  • Test failure WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite #83659

    Future
  • System.Data.OleDb.Tests timeout in net48 x86 Release leg #87783
  • [wasm][7.0-staging] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics`, and `System.Runtime` tests with AOT timing out on windows #87482
    7.0.x
  • System.ComponentModel.Win32Exception : An error occurred trying to start process 'notepad.exe' with working directory 'C:\h\w\9F8D0903\w\B7E309C0\e'. Access is denied #90406
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94649
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fixed doc comment copy mistake #94648
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update slngen and sln files #94645
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move tests from full facade folder to type forward destination #94644
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][llvm] Improve mono_aot_can_specialize (). #94642
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 119.0.6045.123, windows: 119.0.6045.124 #94641
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Fix for a stress crash in ComAwareWeakReferenceNative::HasInteropInfo #94643
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94540
    area-EnC-mono
  • JIT: Improve forwardsub for small types #94631
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Introduce fgDebugCheckTypes #94621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • feat(83547): Adding escaping of property name for GetPath. #84688
    area-System.Text.Json, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] catch the case of updated methods in mono_debug_lookup_source_location #94612
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 8.0.x
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • UInt128: Throw DivideByZeroException when divisor is 0 #94640
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve local assertion prop throughput #94597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce VectorXXX.GetMatchCount and VectorXXX.IndexOfFirstMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add feature switch attribute design doc #94625
    linkable-framework
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix GetCustomAttributes `System.Reflection` API with a custom attribute provider #94602
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • FabricBot: Remove project board automation #94626
    area-Meta
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
